item.title: Shoegaze playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Blouse, Brian Jonestown Massacre, Hum, Kitchens Of Distinction, My Bloody Valentine, Pale Saints, Sway, Wild Nothing, Wildhoney, Yo La Tengo.
